Traits.Name: Intoxicating Pheromones
Traits.Description: If a hostile character ends their turn adjacent to the Nymph, they must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Dominating Kiss
Actions.Description: The Nymph can only use this on an adjacent character who is pacified. The pacified status is removed and the character immediately takes a dash directed by the Nymph. If they end the movement adjacent to an ally, they deal light physical damage to the ally as an effect.
